      • createOrderedPackage

        public boolean createOrderedPackage(OrderedPackage orderedPackage)
        This function creates the ordered package
        Parameters:
        orderedPackage - - An ordered package to be created.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the creation is successful. Return FALSE if the creation fails.

      • removeOrderedPackage

        public boolean removeOrderedPackage(OrderedPackage orderedPackage)
        This function removes the ordered package
        Parameters:
        orderedPackage - - An ordered package to be removed.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the deletion is successful. Return FALSE if the deletion fails.

      • retrieveOrderedPackageByOrderID

        public java.util.List retrieveOrderedPackageByOrderID(int id)
        This function retrieve all the ordered packages that belongs to the order id.
        Parameters:
        id - - An order ID.
        Returns:
        A list of Ordered Packages.
